```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE, include = TRUE,
  message = FALSE
)
library(pointblank)
stopifnot(
  is.list(params$data),
  is.data.frame(params$data$baseline),
  is.data.frame(params$data$adverse)
)
baseline <- params$data$baseline
adverse <- params$data$adverse
```
```{r prepare-data, include = FALSE}
country_code <- unique(baseline$cntry)
stopifnot(length(country_code) == 1)
country_name <- lut[which(
  lut$name == "cntry" & lut$value == country_code
), ]$description
last_save <- max(baseline$lastsavetime, na.rm = TRUE)
unique_subjects <- length(unique(baseline$globalrecordid))
eot_outcomes <- nrow(baseline[which(!is.na(baseline$outcome)), ])
eos_outcomes <- nrow(baseline[which(!is.na(baseline$stat12)), ])
```
## Summary

**Country**: `r country_name`  
**Last save date**: `r last_save`  
**Study participants**: `r unique_subjects`  
**Participants with end of treatment outcome**: `r eot_outcomes`  
**Participants with end of study outcome**: `r eos_outcomes`  
 
```{r define-agents}
al <- action_levels(
  stop_at = 1
)

baseline_agent <-
  create_agent(
    tbl = baseline,
    tbl_name = "baseline",
    label = "Baseline characteristics review",
    actions = al
  )

treatment_agent <-
  create_agent(
    tbl = baseline,
    tbl_name = "treatment",
    label = "Treatment review",
    actions = al
  )

adverse_agent <-
  create_agent(
    tbl = adverse,
    tbl_name = "adverse",
    label = "Adverse event review",
    actions = al
  )
```

## Baseline characteristics

```{r baseline-quality, echo = TRUE}
baseline_agent |>
  col_is_date(
    columns = c("icfdat", "lastsavetime")
  ) |>
  col_vals_gt(
    columns = c("icfdat"),
    value = as.Date("2019-01-01")
  ) |>
  rows_distinct(
    columns = c("cntry", "stsite", "subjid"),
    label = "Distinct patient identifiers",
    brief = "Check the combination of country,
    site ID, and subject ID is unique"
  ) |>
  col_vals_between(
    columns = c("dob"),
    left = as.Date("1900-01-01"),
    right = as.Date("2022-01-01"),
    preconditions = function(x) {
      x$dob <- as.Date(x$dob, format = "%a %b %d %Y")
      x
    }
  ) |>
  col_vals_in_set(
    columns = "sex",
    set = c(1, 2)
  ) |>
  col_vals_between(
    columns = c("weight"),
    left = 0,
    right = 150,
    na_pass = FALSE
  ) |>
  col_vals_between(
    columns = c("height"),
    left = 1,
    right = 200,
    na_pass = FALSE
  ) |>
  col_vals_between(
    preconditions = function(x) {
      x$bmi <- x$weight / ((x$height / 100)^2)
      x
    },
    columns = c("bmi"),
    left = 0,
    right = 40
  ) |>
  col_vals_in_set(
    columns = c(
      "prison", "unempl", "smok",
      "alcohol", "homeless", "idu",
      "hiv", "liver"
    ),
    set = c(1, 2, 9)
  ) |>
  col_vals_in_set(
    columns = c("cav"),
    set = c(1, 2, 3, 9)
  ) |>
  col_vals_in_set(
    columns = c("prevtb"),
    set = c(1, 2, 9)
  ) |>
  col_vals_in_set(
    preconditions = function(x) {
      hep_type <- x$livertype[x$liver == 1]
      data.frame(livertype = hep_type)
    },
    columns = c("livertype"),
    set = c(1, 2, 3, 4)
  ) |>
  interrogate()
```
## Treatment

```{r treatment-quality, echo = TRUE}
treatment_agent |>
  col_is_date(
    columns = c(
      "trtendat", "endat", "trtstdat",
      "fuendat"
    )
  ) |>
  col_vals_between(
    columns = c("totaldose"),
    left = 0,
    right = 400
  ) |>
  col_vals_between(
    columns = c("outcome"),
    left = 1,
    right = 7,
    na_pass = FALSE
  ) |>
  col_vals_in_set(
    preconditions = function(x) {
      x[which(!is.na(x$outcome)), ]
    },
    columns = c("trtprtcl"),
    set = c(0, 1)
  ) |>
  col_vals_between(
    preconditions = function(x) {
      x[which(x$trtprtcl == 0), ]
    },
    columns = c("prtclviol"),
    left = 1,
    right = 10
  ) |>
  col_vals_between(
    preconditions = function(x) {
      x[x$outcome %in% c(1, 2), ]
    },
    columns = c("totaldose"),
    left = 273 - 7,
    right = 273 + 7
  ) |>
  col_vals_between(
    columns = c("stat12"),
    left = 1,
    right = 4
  ) |>
  interrogate()
```
## Adverse events

```{r adverse-quality, echo = TRUE}
adverse_agent |>
  col_is_date(
    columns = c("aeonsetdt", "aenddt")
  ) |>
  col_vals_in_set(
    columns = c("sae"),
    set = c(1, 2)
  ) |>
  col_vals_between(
    preconditions = function(x) {
      x[which(x$sae == 1), ]
    },
    columns = c("saetype"),
    left = 1,
    right = 6
  ) |>
  col_vals_between(
    columns = c("episode"),
    left = 1,
    right = 5
  ) |>
  col_vals_between(
    columns = c("aeterm"),
    left = 1,
    right = 26
  ) |>
  col_vals_in_set(
    columns = c("severity"),
    set = c(1, 2, 3, 4, 9)
  ) |>
  col_vals_in_set(
    columns = c("aeoutcome"),
    set = c(1:5, 9)
  ) |>
  interrogate()
```
